title: setupTestingRouter
contents:
API > @angular/router > @angular/router/testing
mode_edit code

setupTestingRouterlink

用于测试的路由器设置工厂函数。

Router setup factory function used for testing.

setupTestingRouter(urlSerializer: UrlSerializer, contexts: ChildrenOutletContexts, location: Location, loader: NgModuleFactoryLoader, compiler: Compiler, injector: Injector, routes: Route[][], opts?: ExtraOptions | UrlHandlingStrategy, urlHandlingStrategy?: UrlHandlingStrategy)
参数
urlSerializer contexts location loader compiler injector routes opts UrlSerializerChildrenOutletContextsLocationNgModuleFactoryLoaderCompilerInjectorRoute[][]ExtraOptions | UrlHandlingStrategy
可选. 默认值是 `undefined`.
urlHandlingStrategy UrlHandlingStrategy
可选. 默认值是 `undefined`.
